question: : You work for an international company and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another countryWrite a letter to your manager. In your letter:-	Explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six months -	Say how your work could be done while you are away -	Ask for his/her help in arranging it
text: I am writing this with regards to request something from you. The fact is a global technical training course will be held for six months in Finland's headquarter office.

As you know, to be a senior global technical staff, I need some courses to be completed. Fortunately, the Finland office will provide the course this time. Therefore, I really need your support to go there to attend the training.

During I am away from the office, I will arrange everything with my assistance to ensure that our daily operation to be smooth as usual. Moreover, I will pick up urgent calls whenever they needed my support. I will be available to assist any time via email as well throughout my overseas trip. I hope they can cover for me and there will be no issue without me for six months.
I would appreciate it if I could get the testimonial letter from you as my department manager to attend this course. I do not want to miss this chance by this time. I hope you can support my wish.
